text:
(15 January 1943 – 15 September 2018) was a Japanese actress. She was known for her work in Japanese cinema and television. Kiki was born in Tokyo. Kiki was known for her roles in "Ballad of Orin", "The Triple Cross" and in "Half a Confession".
Kiki died of breast cancer in Tokyo on 15 September 2018 at the age of 75.
